gr.uop

Class MTServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.uop.MTServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MTServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

    main class of Multithread KingDomino Server

    see also the inner class MTServerThread (extends Thread)

    this class does everything except of user interface.

    it is called by Server in a new Thread

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MTServer.MTServerThread
      SERVER THREAD one for each CLIENT handles the communication between server and one client
      class  MTServer.Player
      Registered player data.
